thread.title: Become Lost in the ’50s at the Annual Vintage Fifties and Collectables Fair
thread.title_full: Become Lost in the ’50s at the Annual Vintage Fifties and Collectables Fair | Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Become Lost in the ’50s at the Annual Vintage Fifties and Collectables Fair
text:
Become Lost in the ’50s at the Annual Vintage Fifties and Collectables Fair Published on : Thursday, August 6, 2015
Take a trip back in time to the fifties and relive the culture, the icons and everyday life that made it one of the most fascinating, vibrant and celebrated decades ever.
The Campbelltown Catholic Club in Macarthur will be transformed into an extraordinary showcase of antiques and collectables from the 1950s on Sunday, August 23, 2015, when dealers and vintage lovers from around the country combine for the Annual Vintage Fifties and Collectables Fair.
There will be plenty of entertainment, vintage fashion, dolls, household appliances, art, music, jewellery, antique smalls and other interesting stalls full of amazing trash and treasure on display. Other 1950s’ nostalgia as well as dance demonstrations and a fashion parade for adults and kids will also be a highlight. Visitors are invited to come dressed in ’40s and ’50s style clothes, with prizes for the best dressed on the day.
The fair provides for an eclectic range of collectors. All memorabilia and collectable items will be displayed with great care and pride, the dealers themselves endeavoring to offer as much information as possible to collectors. Everything will be for sale. Friendly, fun and easily located just minutes from Campbelltown Railway Station, the Fifties and Collectables Fair is a major drawcard for experienced and novice collectors alike. For the die-hard collector to the regular ’50s fan, the fair promises to be fun for all ages!
Source:-Macarthur
